JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Ship Hull Fitters // Ship Plate Fitters //Platers Wanted
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are lokking for:

  • Ship Hull Fitters // Ship Plate Fitters //Platers 

for marine industry in Denmark

Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Departments. 

Key tasks:

  • Assemble and install ship hull sections according to blueprints and specifications
  • Align and secure structural parts to ensure a proper fit
  • Cut, shape, and prepare metal components for assembly
  • Perform welding, bolting, and riveting tasks as required
  • Locates and marks reference lines; such as center, buttock, and frame lines
  • Positions parts in hull of a Ship, assisted by rigger
  • Aligns parts relation to each other using jacks, lever blocks, chain blocks, clips, wedges, etc.
  • Marks location of holes to be drilled and installs temporary fasteners to hold parts in a place for welding or revising
  • Install packing, gasket, liner, and structural accessories and members such as doors, hatches, brackets, and clips
  • Tack and weld clips and brackets in place prior to permanent welding
  • May prepare molds and templates for fabrication of non-standard parts
  • May roll, bend flange, cut and shape plates, beams, and other heavy metal parts using shop machinery; such as plate roll, presses, bending brakes, and joggle machine
  • Performs other duties as required

Skills:

  • English - must be able to communicate in English 
  • Always attentive to detail and alert to ensure safety
  • Ability to receive and follow instructions and communicate with co-workers
  • Ability to read labels, safety warnings, and guidelines

Experience:

  • Experience from shipyards 
  • Education or professional experience in a given position

We offer you:

  • Job in Denmark 
  • Attractive salary 
  • 37 hours per week with possibilities for overtime
  • Flight tickets
  • Transport to/ from job 
  • Accommodation 
  • Rotation 6 - 12 months 
  • Safety courses
  • Work tools and clothes
  • Help with Work Permit/VISA 
  • Health insurance / Medical help
